function.name: washing_getSupportedCourses
function.description: This function is used to check the supported laundry courses of a washing machine.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to check the supported laundry courses.

groupAction.description: The group action to check the supported laundry courses.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to check the supported laundry courses.
